message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.SI, cs.CL

The paper presents a new approach to music recommendation using reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). It also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) in terms of gathering user preferences and recommending songs. The paper also discusses the use of audio content, which falls under the category of sound (cs.SD) and the novelty of recommendations, which falls under social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a variational inference algorithm, which falls under computational linguistics (cs.CL).
